Saturday: No exercise scheduled, free stuff then!
Sunday:
Day 1: Chest and Triceps
Dumbbell Bench Press - 4 sets of 10 reps
Dumbbell Flyes - 3 sets of 12 reps
Dumbbell Triceps Extensions - 4 sets of 10 reps
Close-grip Push-ups - 3 sets of 15 reps
Monday:
Day 2: Legs
Dumbbell Squats - 4 sets of 12 reps
Dumbbell Lunges - 3 sets of 10 reps per leg
Dumbbell Romanian Deadlifts - 4 sets of 10 reps
Calf Raises - 3 sets of 15 reps

Day 3: Back and Biceps
Dumbbell Rows - 4 sets of 10 reps per arm
Dumbbell Pullovers - 3 sets of 12 reps
Dumbbell Bicep Curls - 4 sets of 10 reps per arm
Hammer Curls - 3 sets of 12 reps per arm
Wednesday:
Day 4: Abs and Core
Dumbbell Russian Twists - 3 sets of 15 reps per side
Dumbbell Bicycle Crunches - 3 sets of 20 reps
Plank with Shoulder Taps - 3 sets of 12 reps per arm
Hanging Leg Raises - 3 sets of 10 reps
Thursday:
Day 5: Shoulders
Dumbbell Shoulder Press - 4 sets of 10 reps
Lateral Raises - 3 sets of 12 reps
Front Raises - 3 sets of 12 reps
Dumbbell Shrugs - 3 sets of 15 reps
